name: Drone Master (early alpha)
description:
Drone Master

Early build of the game, 5 levels available. Last one is presenting challenge of mid-end game difficulty, so be ware!

Looking for feedback on physics and drone controls. Not much content yet to play, around 5 minutes to beat - not counting last level though ;)

Your goal is to reach the end landing zone as quickly as possible. Can you get gold on all the levels?

Try to fly the drone with disabled auto-balancer (turn on or off after selecting level), it's harder but gives more freedom!

Controls:

WSAD / Arrow keys - control drone

F / Z - start engine

E / X - release/pull crane

Space / C - grab objects with crane

ESC / 1 - pause the game

Enter - restart current level
